data.actual_result: The save button infinitely spins, even after leaving the menu and coming back
data.expected_result: The Save button stops loading and can be tapped again
data.short_description: Infinitely loading save button when changing password with 2FA enabled
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn on 2FA - Attempt to change your password - In the prompt that appears asking for your 2FA code, cancel it - Observe the "Save" button
